## ``hc_theme_db``: Dotabuff theme for highcharts

#### Description 

Dotabuff theme for highcharts

#### Usage 
<pre><code>
hc_theme_db(...)
</code></pre> 

#### Arguments 
 
* ``...``: Named argument to modify the theme

#### Examples
 
```{r}
highcharts_demo() %>%
hc_add_theme(hc_theme_db())
```
